topic: Visibility of module assignments in the study administration
question: I have noticed that three of my modules are incorrectly classified: one seminar is shown as an elective subject and two language modules are not correctly assigned. I would like to know how I can enter the language modules as interdisciplinary basics and the seminar as a compulsory seminar, as I will be submitting my bachelor's thesis on October 19th."
answer: Please contact the secretary responsible for your degree program with your request. It is also a good idea to discuss the issuing of your certificate with the secretary. You can find further information here: cit.tum.de/en/cit/contact-studies-informatics/
